item.title: Catherine and Charlotte perform piano duet for Christmas carol concert
item.description: The pre-recorded performance aired on ITV1 on Christmas Eve and saw the pair play a piece by Scottish composer Erland Cooper.

item.title: Officials discover a million more documents potentially related to Epstein case
item.description: The US Department of Justice says reviewing the material could delay release by a "few more weeks".

item.title: Explosion hits packed mosque in Nigeria
item.description: Eyewitnesses say the blast happened as people were gathered for evening prayers.

item.title: Jethro Tull founding member dies aged 82
item.description: Lead singer Ian Anderson says Mick Abrahams was "vitally important" to the band's early line-up.

item.title: Two police officers killed in explosion in Moscow
item.description: A device was detonated after police approached a "suspicious" individual in Moscow, authorities said.
